title: How to Remove Facial Blemishes on GIMP

steps.title: Launch GIMP and open an image.
steps.content: Launch GIMP and open an image. You can also right-click the image and select Open with and then GIMP .

steps.title: Click the bandage icon in the toolbox.
steps.content: Click the bandage icon in the toolbox. It's the two yellow bandages crossed over one another.

steps.title: This will be the basis for your healing.
steps.content: This will be the basis for your healing. Release Ctrl after you've clicked clear skin.

steps.title: As you click each blemish, the blemish will be covered with the clear skin patch.
steps.content: As you click each blemish, the blemish will be covered with the clear skin patch. After you are done the finished product should look as it looks like in the picture.
